results.title: Effects of lisinopril and captopril on calcium in rat heart.
results.text_hl: We studied the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lis@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@Cap@@@), two @GENE_ACE @GENE_24310 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitors, on @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@/reperfusion and normal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ hearts.

results.title: Cardioprotective effect of zofenopril in perfused rat heart subjected to ischemia and reperfusion.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_zofenoprilate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065520 @@@Zofenoprilat@@@ molecule contains a @CHEMICAL_Sulfhydryl_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013438 @@@sulfhydryl@@@ group, and its administration, as compared with @CHEMICAL_Enalaprilat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015773 @@@enalaprilat@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ administration, was associated with better preservation of protein @CHEMICAL_Sulfhydryl_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013438 @@@thiols@@@ at the end of @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Frascarelli S, Ghelardoni S, Ronca-Testoni S, Zucchi R. Cardioprotective effect of zofenopril in perfused rat heart subjected to ischemia and reperfusion. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2004 Feb;43(2):294-9. PMID: 14716220

results.title: Protective effect of ACE inhibitors on ischemia-reperfusion-induced arrhythmias in rats: is this effect related to the free radical scavenging action of these drugs?
results.text_hl: The incidence of @DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@ventricular tachycardia@@@ (@DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@VT@@@) on @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ and reperfusion was significantly reduced by @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Birincioglu M, Aksoy T, Olmez E, Acet A. Protective effect of ACE inhibitors on ischemia-reperfusion-induced arrhythmias in rats: is this effect related to the free radical scavenging action of these drugs? Free Radic Res. 1997 Oct;27(4):389-96. PMID: 9416467

results.title: Comparison of effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibition with those of angiotensin II receptor antagonism on functional and metabolic recovery in postischemic working rat heart as studied by [31P] nuclear magnetic resonance.
results.text_hl: Significantly milder @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@ during @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ and significantly increased coronary flow were characteristic of the improved functional recovery exhibited by the groups treated with either @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ or @CHEMICAL_L_158338 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C083194 @@@L-158,338@@@ in vivo.

results.title: Infarct size limiting effect of apstatin alone and in combination with enalapril, lisinopril and ramipril in rats with experimental myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: We wished to determine the cardioprotective actions of an aminopeptidase P inhibitor, @CHEMICAL_apstatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C097277 @@@apstatin@@@ alone and in combination with @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@/@CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@ in an in vivo @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of acute @<m>DISEASE_Ischemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@ (30 min) and reperfusion (4 h).

citations.NLM: Veeravalli KK, Akula A, Routhu KV, Kota MK. Infarct size limiting effect of apstatin alone and in combination with enalapril, lisinopril and ramipril in rats with experimental myocardial infarction. Pharmacol Res. 2003 Dec;48(6):557-63. PMID: 14527819
